item.title: Neuland Laboratories Gains 0.06%: Mixed Technical Signals and Earnings Impact Weekly
item.description: Neuland Laboratories Ltd closed the week marginally higher by 0.06% at Rs.13,043.80, outperforming the Sensex which declined 0.54% over the same period. The stock exhibited significant volatility, surging 6.86% on Monday before retreating in the following days amid mixed technical signals and market concerns. Despite a strong intraday high early in the week, the stock faced pressure from profit warnings and technical downgrades, resulting in a cautious trading environment by Friday. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: Atlantaa Ltd Falls 8.35%: Financial Struggles and Rising Costs Weigh on Stock

item.title: Dec-2025 Quarterly Earnings Review: Mixed Results Across Market Caps with Select Standouts
